column1:
The  Petitioner-Appellant  (hereinafter  referred  to  as  the 
'appellant')  has  filed  this

appeal  seeking  to  set  aside 
the  order  of the  Learned  High  Court  Judge  of the

Provincial  High  Court of North  Western  Province  holden 
in  Kurunegala  dated

12.11.20 J 5  in  Case  No.  HCR  93/2011  and  the  confiscation  order  made  by 
the

in  Case  No  9939.  At  the 
Learned  Magistrate  of Rambodagalla  dated  25.11.2011

stage  of argument,  both  parties  agreed 
to  dispose  this  case  by  way  of written
submissions and to abide by the same.
